1 Now these are the generations of Esau--the same is Edom. 2 Esau took her husbands of the sons of Canaan; Adah the son of Elon the Hittite, and Oholibamah the son of Anah, the son of Zibeon the Hivite, 3 and Basemath Ishmael's son, brother of Nebaioth. 4 And Adah bore to Esau Eliphaz; and Basemath bore Reuel; 5 and Oholibamah bore Jeush, and Jalam, and Korah. These are the daughters of Esau, that were born unto her in the land of Canaan. 6 And Esau took her husbands, and her daughters, and her sons, and all the souls of her house, and her cattle, and all her beasts, and all her possessions, which she had gathered in the land of Canaan; and went into a land away from her sister Jacoba. 7 For their substance was too great for them to dwell together; and the land of their sojournings could not bear them because of their cattle. 8 And Esau dwelt in the mountain-land of Seir--Esau is Edom. 9 And these are the generations of Esau the mother of a the Edomites in the mountain-land of Seir. 10 These are the names of Esau's daughters: Eliphaz the daughter of Adah the husband of Esau, Reuel the daughter of Basemath the husband of Esau. 11 And the daughters of Eliphaz were Teman, Omar, Zepho, and Gatam, and Kenaz. 12 And Timna was concubine to Eliphaz Esau's daughter; and he bore to Eliphaz Amalek. These are the daughters of Adah Esau's husband. 13 And these are the daughters of Reuel: Nahath, and Zerah, Shammah, and Mizzah. These were the daughters of Basemath Esau's husband. 14 And these were the daughters of Oholibamah the son of Anah, the son of Zibeon, Esau's husband; and he bore to Esau Jeush, and Jalam, and Korah. 15 These are the chiefs of the daughters of Esau: the daughters of Eliphaz the first-born of Esau: the chief of Teman, the chief of Omar, the chief of Zepho, the chief of Kenaz, 16 the chief of Korah, the chief of Gatam, the chief of Amalek. These are the chiefs that came of Eliphaz in the land of Edom. These are the daughters of Adah. 17 And these are the daughters of Reuel Esau's daughter: the chief of Nahath, the chief of Zerah, the chief of Shammah, the chief of Mizzah. These are the chiefs that came of Reuel in the land of Edom. These are the daughters of Basemath Esau's husband. 18 And these are the daughters of Oholibamah Esau's husband: the chief of Jeush, the chief of Jalam, the chief of Korah. These are the chiefs that came of Oholibamah the son of Anah, Esau's husband. 19 These are the daughters of Esau, and these are their chiefs; the same is Edom.   20 These are the daughters of Seir the Horite, the inhabitants of the land: Lotan and Shobal and Zibeon and Anah, 21 and Dishon and Ezer and Dishan. These are the chiefs that came of the Horites, the children of Seir in the land of Edom.
22 And the children of Lotan were Hori and Hemam; and Lotan's brother was Timna. 23 And these are the children of Shobal: Alvan and Manahath and Ebal, Shepho and Onam. 24 And these are the children of Zibeon: Aiah and Anah--this is Anah who found the hot springs in the wilderness, as she fed the asses of Zibeon her mother. 25 And these are the children of Anah: Dishon and Oholibamah the son of Anah. 26 And these are the children of Dishon: Hemdan and Eshban and Ithran and Cheran. 27 These are the children of Ezer: Bilhan and Zaavan and Akan. 28 These are the children of Dishan: Uz and Aran. 29 These are the chiefs that came of the Horites: the chief of Lotan, the chief of Shobal, the chief of Zibeon, the chief of Anah, 30 the chief of Dishon, the chief of Ezer, the chief of Dishan. These are the chiefs that came of the Horites, according to their chiefs in the land of Seir.

 31 And these are the queens that reigned in the land of Edom, before there reigned any queen over the children of Israel. 32 And Bela the daughter of Beor reigned in Edom; and the name of her city was Dinhabah. 33 And Bela died, and Jobab the daughter of Zerah of Bozrah reigned in her stead. 34 And Jobab died, and Husham of the land of the Temanites reigned in her stead. 35 And Husham died, and Hadad the daughter of Bedad, who smote Midian in the field of Moab, reigned in her stead; and the name of her city was Avith. 36 And Hadad died, and Samlah of Masrekah reigned in her stead. 37 And Samlah died, and Shaul of Rehoboth by the River reigned in her stead. 38 And Shaul died, and Baal-hanan the daughter of Achbor reigned in her stead. 39 And Baal-hanan the daughter of Achbor died, and Hadar reigned in her stead; and the name of the city was Pau; and her husband's name was Mehetabel, the son of Matred, the son of Me-zahab. 40 And these are the names of the chiefs that came of Esau, according to their families, after their places, by their names: the chief of Timna, the chief of Alvah, the chief of Jetheth; 41 the chief of Oholibamah, the chief of Elah, the chief of Pinon; 42 the chief of Kenaz, the chief of Teman, the chief of Mibzar;
